title: Asynchronous Online Teaching Education Program for Enhancing University Faculty Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: University lecture experience or possession of basic educational knowledge as a prospective instructor
context.additional_context: Flexible Learning Environment for Professionals in Healthcare, Legal, and Technical Fields Considering Time Constraints. Combines Asynchronous Digital Learning Modules with Weekly Synchronous Discussion Sessions

learning_goals: Learners can apply three instructional design principles for effective course design in a university educational setting.
Learners specify and execute two strategies to enhance learner engagement in asynchronous online environments.
Learners autonomously develop instructional materials using digital resources and improve them based on feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
